description.english: You discovered the balcony code.
description.german: Du hast den Balkoncode entdeckt.
description.french: Vous avez découvert le code du balcon.
description.italian: Hai scoperto il codice del balcone.
description.spanish: Has descubierto el código del balcón.
description.russian: Вы нашли код он балконного лифта.
description.brazilian: Você descobriu o código da sacada.
description.schinese: 你发现了阳台的口令。
description.japanese: バルコニーのコードを発見した

description.english: You repaired your custom AVR headset.
description.german: Du hast dein individuelles AVR-Headset erfolgreich repariert.
description.french: Vous avez réparé votre casque RVA.
description.italian: Sei riuscito a riparare con successo il tuo visore AVR personalizzato.
description.spanish: Has reparado con éxito tu visor de RVA personalizado.
description.brazilian: Você reparou com sucesso seu headset customizado de RVA.
description.schinese: 你成功修好了自己的组装AVR眼镜。
description.japanese: AVRヘッドセットを修理した

description.english: You treated the VR beggar with respect.
description.german: Du warst ein guter Kerl gegenüber dem AVR-Bettler.
description.french: Vous avez fait preuve d'empathie avec le mendiant RV.
description.italian: Ti sei comportato bene con il mendicante di RV.
description.spanish: Te has portado bien con el pordiosero adicto a la RVA.
description.brazilian: Você foi um cara legal com o pedinte de RVA.
description.schinese: 你帮助了那个AVR乞丐。
description.japanese: AVR好きのホームレスに優しく接した

description.english: You accessed your bank account.
description.german: Du hast es geschafft, auf dein Bankkonto zuzugreifen.
description.french: Vous avez consulté votre compte en banque.
description.italian: Sei riuscito ad accedere al tuo conto corrente.
description.spanish: Has conseguido acceder a tu cuenta del banco.
description.russian: Вы получили доступ к своему банковскому счету.
description.brazilian: Você conseguiu acessar sua conta bancária.
description.schinese: 你成功进入了自己的银行账户。
description.japanese: 銀行口座にアクセスできた

description.english: You love stalking people!
description.german: Es macht dir wirklich Spaß, Menschen zu stalken!
description.french: Vous adorez suivre les gens !
description.italian: Ti diverti davvero a stalkerare la gente!
description.spanish: ¡Te encanta espiar a la gente!
description.russian: Вы и вправду любите преследовать людей!
description.brazilian: Você realmente gosta de observar as pessoas!
description.schinese: 你真得特别喜欢跟踪别人！
description.japanese: ストーカー行為は意外と楽しい？

description.english: Worst boyfriend of the year award. Winner: You.
description.german: Preis für den schlimmsten Freund des Jahres. Gewinner: Du.
description.french: Et le prix du pire copain de l'année revient à... Vous !
description.italian: Premio come peggior fidanzato dell'anno. Vincitore: tu.
description.spanish: Premio al peor novio del año. Ganado: tú.
description.brazilian: Prêmio de pior namorado do ano. Vencedor: você.
description.schinese: 年度最烂男朋友奖得主——内森。
description.japanese: ワースト彼氏賞候補かも...

description.english: You joined The Blade.
description.german: Du bist The Blade beigetreten.
description.french: Vous avez rejoint The Blade.
description.italian: Ti sei unito a The Blade.
description.spanish: Te has unido a The Blade.
description.russian: Вы вступили в ряды The Blade.
description.brazilian: Você se juntou à The Blade.
description.schinese: 你加入了The Blade。
description.japanese: ブレードのメンバーになった

description.english: You wired the touchscreen on the first attempt.
description.german: Du hast den Touchscreen beim ersten Versuch fehlerfrei verkabelt.
description.french: Vous avez câblé l'écran tactile du premier coup sans commettre d'erreur.
description.italian: Hai collegato il touch screen al primo tentativo senza commettere errori.
description.spanish: Has cableado sin errores la pantalla táctil al primer intento.
description.russian: Вы подключили тачскрин без ошибок с первой попытки.
description.brazilian: Você conectou a tela sensível ao toque sem erros na primeira tentativa.
description.schinese: 你正确接好了触摸屏的所有线路，一次都没有失败。
description.japanese: 一発でタッチスクリーンを接続

description.english: You found the Cubus Club. Time to locate Jay!
description.german: Du hast es in den Club geschafft. Zeit, Jay zu finden!
description.french: Vous avez atteint le Club. Il est temps de retrouver Jay !
description.italian: Sei arrivato al Club. È ora di trovare Jay!
description.spanish: Has conseguido entrar en el club. ¡Es hora de encontrar a Jay!
description.russian: Вы прибыли в клуб. Пора найти Джей!
description.brazilian: Você chegou ao clube. Hora de encontrar Jay!
description.schinese: 你到达库布斯，该去找杰伊了！
description.japanese: クラブに到着。ジェイを探そう！

description.english: Your fandom for Thunderbone is beyond reproach.
description.german: Dein Fandom für Thunderbone hat Grenzen überschritten.
description.french: Votre adoration pour Thunderbone est allée trop loin.
description.italian: La tua passione per Thunderbone ha oltrepassato ogni limite.
description.spanish: Tu afición por Thunderbone ha traspasado los límites.
description.russian: Вы, без всякого сомнения, преданный фанат Thunderborne.
description.brazilian: Sua adoração por Thunderbone passou dos limites.
description.schinese: 你对Thunderbone的热爱犹如滔滔江水，连绵不绝。
description.japanese: いくらサンダーボーン好きでも、流石に引かれた...

description.english: You won the drone race.
description.german: Du hast das Drohnenrennen gewonnen.
description.french: Vous avez remporté la course de drones.
description.italian: Hai vinto la corsa di droni.
description.spanish: Has ganado la carrera de drones.
description.russian: Вы выиграли в гонке на дронах.
description.brazilian: Você venceu a corrida de drones.
description.schinese: 你在无人机比赛中胜出。
description.japanese: ドローンレースで勝った！

description.english: You found Jay. And she's pissed.
description.german: Du hast Jay endlich gefunden. Und sie ist schon wütend auf dich.
description.french: Vous avez enfin retrouvé Jay ! Et vous avez déjà réussi à l'énerver...
description.italian: Hai finalmente trovato Jay. E ce l'ha già con te.
description.spanish: Por fin has encontrado a Jay. Y ya está enfadada contigo.
description.russian: Вы наконец-то встретились с Джей. И она уже на вас сердится.
description.brazilian: Você finalmente encontrou Jay, e ela já está irritada com você.
description.schinese: 你终于见到了杰伊，她已经对你怒气冲冲。
description.japanese: ジェイを見つけたぞ。けど、怒っているようだ...

displayName.japanese: ミッション・インポシブル

description.english: You were briefed on the mission.
description.german: Du wurdest über die Mission informiert.
description.french: Vous venez d'être briefé sur la mission.
description.italian: Sei stato aggiornato sulla missione.
description.spanish: Te han informado de la misión.
description.brazilian: Você foi informado sobre a missão.
description.schinese: 你知道了任务的基本情况。
description.japanese: ミッションの指示を受けた

description.english: You spoiled the end of the story for the drummer.
description.german: Du hast dem Schlagzeuger das Ende der Geschichte verdorben.
description.french: Vous avez raconté la fin de l'histoire au batteur.
description.italian: Hai spoilerato la fine della storia al batterista.
description.spanish: Le has destripado el final de la historia al batería.
description.brazilian: Você estragou o fim da história para o baterista.
description.schinese: 你向鼓手剧透了漫画的结局。
description.japanese: ネタバレを言うクズ

description.english: You have arrived in Nuwaka.
description.german: Du bist in Nuwaka angekommen.
description.french: Vous êtes arrivé à Nuwaka.
description.italian: Sei arrivato a Nuwaka.
description.spanish: Has llegado a Nuwaka.
description.brazilian: Você chegou em Nuwaka
description.schinese: 你到达了努瓦卡。
description.japanese: ヌワカに到着

description.english: You have reached Satnajoskull.
description.german: Du hast Satnajoskull erreicht.
description.french: Vous avez atteint Satnajoskull.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto Satnajoskull.
description.spanish: Has llegado a Satnajoskull.
description.brazilian: Você chegou em Satnajoskull
description.schinese: 你到达了萨特纳霍斯考尔。
description.japanese: サナジョスカルに到着

description.english: You have entered Jakharrak.
description.german: Du hast Jakharrak erreicht.
description.french: Vous avez atteint Jakharrak.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto Jakharrak.
description.spanish: Has llegado a Jakharrak.
description.brazilian: Você chegou em Jakharrak.
description.schinese: 你到达了雅卡拉克。
description.japanese: ジャクハラクに到着

description.english: You're ready to meet the Cypher Master.
description.german: Du bist bereit, den Cypher Master zu treffen.
description.french: Vous êtes prêt à rencontrer le Maître du Chiffrement.
description.italian: Sei pronto a incontrare il Cypher Master.
description.spanish: Estás preparado para reunirte con el Maestro Cifrador.
description.russian: Вы готовы к встрече с Цифровым мастером.
description.brazilian: Você está pronto para conhecer o Mestre Criptógrafo.
description.schinese: 你准备好见密码宗师了。
description.japanese: サイファーマスターに会う準備ができた

description.english: You were ripped off by the condom dispenser.
description.german: Du wurdest vom Kondom-Spender reingelegt.
description.french: Vous vous êtes fait arnaquer par le distributeur de préservatifs.
description.italian: Sei stato imbrogliato dal distributore di profilattici!
description.spanish: El dispensador de preservativos se ha quedado tu dinero.
description.brazilian: Você foi enganado pelo distribuidor de preservativos.
description.schinese: 安全套贩卖机吞了你的钱。
description.japanese: コンドーム自販機に詐欺られた！

description.english: You found the source code.
description.german: Du hast endlich den Quellcode gefunden.
description.french: Vous avez enfin retrouvé le code source.
description.italian: Hai finalmente trovato il codice sorgente.
description.spanish: Por fin has conseguido el código fuente.
description.brazilian: Você finalmente encontrou o código fonte.
description.schinese: 你终于拿到了源代码。
description.japanese: やっとソースコードを見つけた

description.english: You met the Cypher Master in hyper reality.
description.german: Du hast den Cypher Master in der Hyperrealität getroffen.
description.french: Vous avez rencontré le Maître du Chiffrement dans l'hyperréalité.
description.italian: Hai incontrato il Cypher Master nella Iper-Realtà.
description.spanish: Te has reunido con el Maestro Cifrador en la hiperrealidad.
description.russian: Вы встретились с Цифровым мастером в Гиперреальности.
description.brazilian: Você conheceu o Mestre Criptógrafo na hiper realidade.
description.schinese: 你在超级现实里见到了密码大师。
description.japanese: サイファーマスターをハイパーリアリティで会った

description.english: You solved the Ghost of the Navigator riddle.
description.german: Du hast das Rätsel des Geistes des Navigators gelöst.
description.french: Vous avez résolu l'énigme du Fantôme du navigateur.
description.italian: Hai risolto il rompicapo del Ghost of the Navigator
description.spanish: Has resuelto el acertijo del fantasma del navegante.
description.russian: Вы разгадали все загадки Призрака Навигатора.
description.brazilian: Você solucionou a charada do Fantasma do Navegador.
description.schinese: 你解开了指路幽魂的谜语。
description.japanese: ゴーストナビゲーターのなぞなぞを解いた

displayName.japanese: テクノマンサーの隠れ家

description.english: You have entered the den of the Technomancers.
description.german: Du hast die Technomancer erreicht.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé les Technomanciens.
description.italian: Hai trovato i Technomancer.
description.spanish: Has llegado a los tecnomantes.
description.brazilian: Você encontrou os Tecnomantes.
description.schinese: 你见到了技术法师。
description.japanese: テクノマンサーを見つけた

description.english: You subscribed the mechanic to quite a bit of spam.
description.german: Du hast den Mechaniker für viele Spam-Dienste angemeldet.
description.french: Vous avez inscrit le Mécanicien à plusieurs services de spams.
description.italian: Hai iscritto il meccanico a un sacco di servizi spam.
description.spanish: Has suscrito al mecánico a un montón de servicios de spam.
description.russian: Вы подписали механика на годовую спам-подписку.
description.brazilian: Você inscreveu o mecânico em vários serviços de spam.
description.schinese: 你给汽配工订阅了海量垃圾服务。
description.japanese: メカニックにスパムメールがたくさん届くように手配した

description.english: You climbed your way to the lighthouse.
description.german: Du bist zum Leuchtturm hinaufgeklettert.
description.french: Vous avez atteint le sommet du Phare.
description.italian: Ti sei arrampicato fino alla sommità del faro.
description.spanish: Has escalado hasta el faro.
description.russian: Вы забрались на самый верх Маяка.
description.brazilian: Você escalou até o farol.
description.schinese: 你爬到了灯塔最顶层。
description.japanese: 灯台の上まで登れた！

description.english: You controlled the cleaning robot with the Ultra Glove.
description.german: Du hast den Reinigungsroboter erfolgreich mit dem Ultra Glove of Power gesteuert.
description.french: Vous avez réussi à contrôler le robot de nettoyage avec le Ultra Glove of Power.
description.italian: Sei riuscito a controllare con successo il robot per la pulizia con l'Ultra Glove of Power.
description.spanish: Has controlado con éxito el robot de limpieza con el Ultra Glove of Power.
description.russian: Вы успешно контролировали робота-уборщика Ультра-перчаткой Силы.
description.brazilian: Você conseguiu controlar o Robô Faxineiro com a Ultra Glove of Power.
description.schinese: 你用究极能量手套控制了清洁机器人。
description.japanese: パワーグローブを使ってお掃除ロボットを操作した

description.english: You coded the malware.
description.german: Du hast die Malware programmiert.
description.french: Vous avez codé le malware.
description.italian: Hai codificato il malware.
description.spanish: Has programado el malware.
description.brazilian: Você programou o malware.
description.schinese: 你们写出了恶意代码。
description.japanese: マルウェアをコードした

description.english: You met the giant octopus.
description.german: Du hast den Riesenkrake getroffen.
description.french: Vous avez rencontré la Pieuvre géante.
description.italian: Hai incontrato il Polpo Gigante.
description.spanish: Te has encontrado con el pulpo gigante.
description.brazilian: Você conheceu o polvo gigante.
description.schinese: 你遇到了巨型章鱼。
description.japanese: 巨大タコに出会えたぞ

description.english: You went fishing for the giant octopus.
description.german: Du hast den Riesenkrake geködert.
description.french: Vous avez pêché la Pieuvre géante.
description.italian: Hai pescato il Polpo Gigante.
description.spanish: Has pescado al pulpo gigante.
description.brazilian: Você pescou o polvo gigante.
description.schinese: 你引开了巨型章鱼。
description.japanese: 巨大タコを釣ったぞ

description.english: The missile is ready to fire!
description.german: Die Rakete ist startbereit!
description.french: Le missile est paré au lancement !
description.italian: Il missile è pronto al lancio!
description.spanish: ¡El misil está listo para el lanzamiento!
description.brazilian: O míssil está pronto para ser lançado!
description.schinese: 导弹就位，可以发射！
description.japanese: ミサイル発射の準備ができました！

description.english: You started the DDoS.
description.german: Du hast den DDoS gestartet.
description.french: Vous avez lancé l'exécution du DDoS.
description.italian: Hai lanciato il DDoS.
description.spanish: Has lanzado el ataque DDoS.
description.brazilian: Você começou o DDoS.
description.schinese: 你们发动了DDoS攻击。
description.japanese: DDoS攻撃を始めた

displayName.japanese: パラダイムを阻止した

description.english: Reality is not what it seems. Anymore.
description.german: Die Realität ist nicht das, was sie zu sein scheint. Nicht mehr.
description.french: La réalité n'est pas... n'est PLUS ce qu'elle était.
description.italian: La realtà non è ciò che sembra. Non più.
description.spanish: La realidad no es lo que parece. Nunca más.
description.russian: Реальность больше не то, чем кажется.
description.brazilian: A realidade não é o que parece ser. Não mais.
description.schinese: 你所看到的不再是现实。
description.japanese: 現実とは？

displayName.japanese: バックトゥザゲンジツ

description.english: You successfully stopped the VirtuaVerse!
description.german: Du hast das VirtuaVerse erfolgreich gestoppt.
description.french: Vous avez réussi à arrêter le VirtuaVerse.
description.italian: Sei riuscito a fermare il VirtuaVerse.
description.spanish: ¡Has desconectado con éxito el VirtuaVerse!
description.brazilian: Você interrompeu com sucesso o VirtuaVerse.
description.schinese: 你成功破坏了虚拟宇宙！
description.japanese: VirtuaVerseの進行を防いだ！
